thread.section_title: Hotel Le Royal - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: great hotel, helpful staff
thread.title_full: great hotel, helpful staff - Review of Hotel Le Royal, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Alexandra V
title: great hotel, helpful staff
text:
what a nice hotel to stay in.
We had a very pleasant time there. We stayed 5 days in paris and it was very easy to commute there. There is a train station just by the corner and the neighborhood is very friendly and with plenty of options to dine.
The room was very clean as well as the toilet. The staff was very friendly and helpful.
Breakfast was included and even tough it wasn't plenty of choices of food, it was very nice. I would strongly recommend this place!!
